name.baseName: Polylactic Acid ; Starch ; Saccharification - fermentation - polymerization ; All sizes; NESPS2
聚乳酸 ; 淀粉 ; 糖化—发酵—聚合 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 通过淀粉糖化、发酵和聚合工艺生产的聚乳酸（PLA）是一种生物可降解聚合物，用于包括包装材料、农用膜、一次性餐具和医疗设备等多种应用。所述工艺适用于所有规模的PLA生产设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码28,三级代码283.0,四级代码2832文件，在完整版文件中第696页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为聚乳酸，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
